Description

Running out of space in this cliff environment our hero murdock will live new adventures after he knew his father died and he has to be in war alone against beasts.

How to play:

Controls:

W - Move Forward.

S - Move Backward.

A - Move Left.

D - Move Right.

Left Mouse Button - Fire.

Right Mouse Button - Aiming.

Mouse Wheel Axis - Swap Weapon.

Left Shift - Sprint.

Jump - Space.

R - Reload.

Scape - Menu.

C - Crouch.

Green pickups - Health.

M - Menu.

In memory of my father who died in August 2021.
